comment: Okay so I am about to be a junior but he left such an impact on me as a freshman I felt like I needed to say this.He was the very first face I ever saw in college, I believe it was also his first day as well. We had a research paper we worked on the whole semester. He was very kind and funny. Ask him how he is enjoying the new season of housewives!

Friendliest soul I've encountered on the campus. I used to struggle with writing papers but he changed everything. Understands that students are not sheep. You get enough time for papers and have to engage in class with other peers but I loved that as you know what your paper is missing.

Pretty awesome professor. Mr Vines seems to genuinely want his students to become better writers. Assignments are balanced to where nothing feels rushed but you still need to think about what you're writing. Feedback is kind but fair. I genuinely found some of the papers fun to write.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: He is very clear in what he expects and if you ever have questions, he is SO NICE. I felt like he was a genuinely good person who wanted me to do well in his class. Super humble and kind.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Overall a good class. I would take him again.
So super kind and classy! He will help you, not be rude to you like some of these professors here. He enjoys his job and it shows. A good professor.
He is incredibly kind in his feedback. He truly wants to help you become a better writer. You can tell that he is just a genuinely kind, good and humble person. A wonderful instructor and person!
Really easy class could've gotten an A+ if I did the assignments on time.
Friendly and welcoming. Class is pretty easy with a final paper and presentation being the major grades. Weekly discussion posts are simple and he provides good feedback.
Prof Vines is super understanding while still challenging. Class is not hard but makes you think. Prof Vines is def the best teacher to take for this course.
if you are taking english 1102 take him like do urself a favor.
Super nice and understanding. Only one paper to whole year with a presentation on that paper at the end. Weekly discussion posts but they are super easy.
